thread.title: William Bain Jr. Founded Consulting and Private-Equity Firms, and Groomed Mitt Romney

author: James R. Hagerty
title: William Bain Jr. Founded Consulting and Private-Equity Firms, and Groomed Mitt Romney
text:
As a student at Vanderbilt University, William Bain Jr. studied history and dreamed of becoming a teacher. Then he ran into a barrier because historical research, which meant sitting alone digging through old documents, bored him.
So he found work at the university’s development office, responsible for soliciting donations from wealthy alumni. He found he had a surprising rapport with the CEOs he met.
“I...
